analysis.key_quote: Schedule F proposal should NOT BE CONSIDERED as it is not based on merit but rather political appointment, which will mean we will be subject to the political whims of the party in power and not the decisions of a knowledgeable, nonpartisan, experienced professionals.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the Schedule F proposal by highlighting concerns about politicization and the undermining of a merit-based system, indicating a clear stance against the rule.
